Class: ServerMessageData

ServerMessageData(data, length)

Encapsulates a server message data buffer and its 32 bit length value (if present).

Constructor

new ServerMessageData(data, length)

Constructor.

Parameters:
Name Type Default Description
data Uint8Array

The message data. Can be incomplete.
length Number null

The complete message's length in bytes as received in the first 32 bit integer. Is null if the buffer starts in the middle of a message.
